name: EverSync - Sync bookmarks, backup favorites
summary: Bookmark sync extension with wildcard externally_connectable allowing ANY Chrome extension to message it and invoke privileged functionality. Uses chrome.management.getAll() to enumerate all installed extensions. PostMessage bridge uses wildcard origin. Any installed extension can interact with EverSync's privileged APIs.

vulnerabilities.title: Wildcard externally_connectable
vulnerabilities.description: Declares externally_connectable with ids: ['*'], allowing ANY Chrome extension to send messages and invoke privileged functionality.

vulnerabilities.title: Extension Enumeration via chrome.management.getAll
vulnerabilities.description: Enumerates all installed extensions to find companion extension, exposing complete extension inventory.

flags.description: Uses chrome.management.getAll() revealing user's complete extension list to any extension that can message it
Content script postMessage bridge uses wildcard origin '*' allowing compromised vendor site to send arbitrary messages
